alert.note: Alert for East Baton Rouge; Eastern Ascension; Northern Livingston; Southern Livingston; Western Ascension (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 5:59PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Ascension, southwestern Livingston and south central East Baton Rouge Parishes through 630 PM CDT... At 559 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Shenandoah, or near Oak Hills Place, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Baton Rouge, Denham Springs, Gonzales, Oak Hills Place, Walker, Sorrento, French Settlement, Port Vincent, Old Jefferson, Inniswold, Prairieville, Village St. George and Shenandoah. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 163 and 178, and between mile markers 180 and 188. Interstate 12 between mile markers 4 and 15. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Baton Rouge; Eastern Ascension; Northern Livingston; Southern Livingston; Western Ascension
